gurmukhi: < siqgur pRswid ]
transliteration: Ik-ōṅkār satigur prasādi ॥
translation: The Lord is One and He can be attained through the Grace of The True Guru.

gurmukhi: kbXo bwc bynqI ]
transliteration: Kabyō bāc bēntī ॥
translation: Speech of the poet.

gurmukhi: cOpeI ]
transliteration: Chaupaī ॥
translation: Chaupai

gurmukhi: hmrI kro hwQ dY r`Cw ] pUrn hoie ic`q kI ie`Cw ]
transliteration: Hamrī karō hāth dai rachchhā ॥ pūran hōi chitt kī ichchhā ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands all the desires of my heart be fulfilled.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 377 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: qv crnn mn rhY hmwrw ] Apnw jwn kro pRiqpwrw ]377]
transliteration: Tav charnan man rahai hamārā ॥ apnā jān karō pratipārā ॥377॥
translation: Let my mind rest under Thy Feet; sustain me, considering me Thine own.377.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 377 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: hmry duSt sBY qum Gwvhu ] Awpu hwQ dY moih bcwvhu ]
transliteration: Hamrē dushaṭ sabhai tum ghāvhu ॥ āpu hāth dai mōhi bachāvhu ॥
translation: Destroy, O Lord ! all my enemies and protect me with Thine won Hnads.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 378 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: suKI bsY moro pirvwrw ] syvk is`KX sBY krqwrw ]378]
transliteration: Sukhī basai mōrō parivārā ॥ sēvak sikkhay sabhai kartārā ॥378॥
translation: May my family live in comfort and ease alongwith all my servants and disciples.378.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 378 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: mo r`Cw inju kr dY kirXY ] sB bYirn kO Awj sMGirXY ]
transliteration: Mō rachchhā niju kar dai kariyai ॥ sabh bairin kau āj saṅghriyai ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands and destroy this day all my enemies;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 379 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: pUrn hoie hmwrI Awsw ] qoir Bjn kI rhY ipXwsw ]379]
transliteration: Pūran hōi hamārī āsā ॥ tōri bhajan kī rahai piyāsā ॥379॥
translation: May all the aspirations be fulfilled; let my thirst for Thy Name remain afresh.379.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 379 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: qumih Cwif koeI Avr n DXwaUN ] jo br choN su qumqy pwaUN ]
transliteration: Tumhi chhāḍi kōī avar na dhayāūń ॥ jō bar chahōń su tumtē pāūń ॥
translation: I may remember none else except Thee; and obtain all the required boons from Thee;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 380 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

transliteration: Sēvak sikkhay hamārē tāriyhi ॥ chun chun shattru hamārē māriyhi ॥380॥
translation: Let my servants and disciples cross the world-ocean; all my enemies be singled out and killed.380.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 380 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: Awpu hwQ dY muJY aubirXY ] mrn kwl qRws invirXY ]
transliteration: Āpu hāth dai mujhai ubriyai ॥ maran kāl trās nivriyai ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands and relieve me form the fear of death;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 381 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: hUjo sdw hmwry p`Cw ] sRI AisDuj jU kirXhu r`Cw ]381]
transliteration: Hūjō sadā hamārē pachchhā ॥ srī asidhuj jū kariyhu rachchhā ॥381॥
translation: May Thou ever Bestow Thy favours on my side; Protect me O Lord ! Thou, the Supreme Destroyer.381.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 381 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: rwiK lyhu muih rwKnhwry ] swihb sMq shwie ipXwry ]
transliteration: Rākhi lēhu muhi rākhnahārē ॥ sāhib sant sahāi piyārē ॥
translation: Protect me, O Lord ! Thou, the Protector, O Lord ! Most dear, the Protector of the Saints:

gurmukhi: dInbMDu duStn ky hMqw ] qumho purI cqurds kMqw ]382]
transliteration: Dīnbandhu dushṭan kē hantā ॥ tumhō purī chaturdas kantā ॥382॥
translation: Friend of poor and the Destroyer of the enemies; Thou art the Master of the fourteen worlds.382.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 382 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: kwl pwie bRhmw bpu Drw ] kwl pwie iSvjU Avqrw ]
transliteration: Kāl pāi brahmā bapu dharā ॥ kāl pāi shivjū avtarā ॥
translation: In due time Brahma appeared in physical form; in due time Shiva incarnated;

gurmukhi: kwl pwie kir ibSn pRkwSw ] skl kwl kw kIXw qmwSw ]383]
transliteration: Kāl pāi kari bishan prakāshā ॥ sakal kāl kā kīyā tamāshā ॥383॥
translation: In due time Vishnu manifested himself; all this is the play of the Temporal Lord.383.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 383 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

transliteration: Javan kāl jōgī shiv kīyō ॥ bēd rāj brahmā jū thīyō ॥
translation: The Temporal Lord, who created Shiva, the Yogi; who created Brahma, the Master of the Vedas;

transliteration: Javan kāl sabh lōk savārā ॥ namshakār hai tāhi hamārā ॥384॥
translation: The Temporal Lord who fashioned the entire world; I salute the same Lord.384.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 384 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: jvn kwl sB jgq bnwXo ] dyv dYq j`Cn aupjwXo ]
transliteration: Javan kāl sabh jagat banāyō ॥ dēv dait jachchhan upjāyō ॥
translation: The Temporal Lord, who created the whole world; who created gods, demons and yakshas;

gurmukhi: Awid AMiq eykY Avqwrw ] soeI gurU smiJXhu hmwrw ]385]
transliteration: Ādi anti ēkai avtārā ॥ sōī gurū samjhiyhu hamārā ॥385॥
translation: He is the only one form the beginning to the end; I consider Him only my Guru.385.

gurmukhi: nmSkwr iqs hI ko hmwrI ] skl pRjw ijn Awp svwrI ]
transliteration: Namshakār tis hī kō hamārī ॥ sakal prajā jin āp savārī ॥
translation: I salute Him, non else, but Him; who has created Himself and His subject;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 386 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: isvkn ko svgun suK dIXo ] S`qRun ko pl mo bD kIXo ]386]
transliteration: Sivkan kō savgun sukh dīyō ॥ shattrun kō pal mō badh kīyō ॥386॥
translation: He bestows Divine virtues and happiness on His servants; He destroys the enemies instantly.386.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 386 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: Gt Gt ky AMqr kI jwnq ] Bly bury kI pIr pCwnq ]
transliteration: Ghaṭ ghaṭ kē antar kī jānat ॥ bhalē burē kī pīr pachhānat ॥
translation: He knows the inner feelings of every heart; He knows the anguish of both good and bad;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 387 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: cItI qy kuMcr AsQUlw ] sB pr ikRpw idRSit kir PUlw ]387]
transliteration: Chīṭī tē kuñchar asthūlā ॥ sabh par kripā drishṭi kari phūlā ॥387॥
translation: From the ant to the solid elephant; He casts His Graceful glance on all and feels pleased.387.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 387 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: sMqn duK pwey qy duKI ] suK pwey swDn ky suKI ]
transliteration: Santan dukh pāē tē dukhī ॥ sukh pāē sādhan kē sukhī ॥
translation: He is painful, when He sees His saints in grief; He is happy, when His saints are happy.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 388 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: eyk eyk kI pIr pCwnY ] Gt Gt ky pt pt kI jwnY ]388]
transliteration: Ēk ēk kī pīr pachhānai ॥ ghaṭ ghaṭ kē paṭ paṭ kī jānai ॥388॥
translation: He knows the agony of everyone; He knows the innermost secrets of every heart.388.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 388 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: jb audkrK krw krqwrw ] pRjw Drq qb dyh Apwrw ]
transliteration: Jab udkarakh karā kartārā ॥ prajā dharat tab dēh apārā ॥
translation: When the Creator projected Himself, His creation manifested itself in innumerable forms;

transliteration: Jab ākrakh karat hō kabahūń ॥ tum mai milat dēh dhar sabhhūń ॥389॥
translation: When at any time He withdraws His creation, all the physical forms are merged in Him.389.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 389 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

transliteration: Jētē badan srishṭi sabh dhārai ॥ āpu āpunī būjhi uchārai ॥
translation: All the bodies of living beings created in the world speak about Him according to their understanding;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 390 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: qum sB hI qy rhq inrwlm ] jwnq byd Byd Aru Awlm ]390]
transliteration: Tum sabh hī tē rahat nirālam ॥ jānat bēd bhēd aru ālam ॥390॥
translation: But Thou, O Lord ! live quite apart form everything; this fact is know to the Vedas and the learned.390.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 390 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: inrMkwr inRibkwr inRlMB ] Awid AnIl Anwid AsMB ]
transliteration: Nirṅkār nribikār nrilambh ॥ ādi anīl anādi asambh ॥
translation: The Lord is Formless, Sinless and shelterless: He is the Primal Power, Blemishlless, Behinningless and Unborn;

gurmukhi: qwkw mUVH aucwrq Bydw ] jwko Byv n pwvq bydw ]391]
transliteration: Tākā mūṛh uchārat bhēdā ॥ jākō bhēv na pāvat bēdā ॥391॥
translation: The fool claims boastfully about the knowledge of His secrets, which even the Vedas do not know.391.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 391 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: qwkO kir pwhn Anumwnq ] mhW mUVH kCu Byd n jwnq ]
transliteration: Tākau kari pāhan anumānat ॥ mahāń mūṛh kachhu bhēd na jānat ॥
translation: The fool considers Him a stone, but the great fool does not know any secret;

transliteration: Mahāndēv kau kahat sadā shiv ॥ nirṅkār kā chīnat nahi bhiv ॥392॥
translation: He calls Shiva “The Eternal Lord, “but he does not know the secret of the Formless Lord.392.

gurmukhi: Awpu AwpunI buiD hY jyqI ] brnq iBMn iBMn quih qyqI ]
transliteration: Āpu āpunī budhi hai jētī ॥ barnat bhinn bhinn tuhi tētī ॥
translation: According to one;s won intellect, one describes Thee differently;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 393 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

transliteration: Tumrā lakhā na jāi pasārā ॥ kih bidhi sajā pratham sańsārā ॥393॥

attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 393 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

translation: He hath only one unparalleled Form; He manifests Himself as a poor man or a king at different places;

gurmukhi: sgrI isRSit idKwie AcMBv ] Awid jugwid srUp suXMBv ]395]
transliteration: Sagarī srishṭi dikhāi acmbhav ॥ ādi jugādi sarūp suymbhav ॥395॥
translation: All His creation unfolds wonderful things; He, the Primal Power, is from the beginning and Self-Existent.395.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 395 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: Ab r`Cw myrI qum kro ] is`KX aubwir Ais`KX s`Gro ]
transliteration: Ab rachchhā mērī tum karō ॥ sikkhay ubāri asikkhay sagghrō ॥
translation: O Lord ! keep me now under Thy protection; protect my disciples and destroy my enemies;

transliteration: Dushaṭ jitē uṭhvat utpātā ॥ sakal malēchh karō raṇ ghātā ॥396॥
translation: All the villains creations outrage and all the infidels be destroyed in the battlefield.396.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 396 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: jy AisDuj qv SrnI pry ] iqn ky duSt duiKq hÍY mry ]
transliteration: Jē asidhuj tav sharnī parē ॥ tin kē dushaṭ dukhit hvai marē ॥
translation: O Supreme Destroyer ! those who sought Thy refuge, their enemies met painful death;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 397 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: purK jvn pgu pry iqhwry ] iqn ky qum sMkt sB twry ]397]
transliteration: Purakh javan pagu parē tihārē ॥ tin kē tum saṅkaṭ sabh ṭārē ॥397॥
translation: The persons who fell at Thy Feet, Thou didst remove all their troubles.397.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 397 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: jo kil kO iek bwr iDAYhY ] qw ky kwl inkit nih AYhY ]
transliteration: Jō kali kau ik bār dhiaihai ॥ tā kē kāl nikṭi nahi aihai ॥
translation: Those who meditate even on the Supreme Destroyer, the death cannot approach them;

transliteration: Rachchhā hōi tāhi sabh kālā ॥ dushaṭ arishaṭ ṭarē tatkālā ॥398॥
translation: They remain protected at all times; their enemies and troubles come to and end instantly.398.

transliteration: Kripā drishāṭi tan jāhi nihrihō ॥ tākē tāp tanak mahi harihō ॥
translation: Upon whomsoever Thou dost cast Thy favourable glance, they are absolved of sins instantly;
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 399 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: ir`iD is`iD Gr moN sB hoeI ] duSt Cwh CÍY skY n koeI ]399]
transliteration: Riddhi siddhi ghar mōń sabh hōī ॥ dushaṭ chhāh chhvai sakai na kōī ॥399॥
translation: They have all the worldly and spiritual pleasures in their homes; none of th enemies can even touch their shadow.399.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 399 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

translation: He, who remembered Thee even once, Thou didst protect him from the noose of death;

transliteration: Jin nar nām tihārō kahā ॥ dārid dushaṭ dōkh tē rahā ॥400॥
translation: Those persons, who repeated Thy Name, they were saved from poverty and attacks of enemies.400.

transliteration: Sarab ṭhaur mō hōhu sahāī ॥ dushaṭ dōkh tē lēhu bachāī ॥401॥
translation: Bestow Thy help on me at all places and protect me from the designs of my enemies.401.

transliteration: Kripā karī ham par jagmātā ॥ granth karā pūran subh rātā ॥

gurmukhi: iklibK skl dyh ko hrqw ] duSt doiKXn ko CY krqw ]402]
transliteration: Kilbikh sakal dēh kō hartā ॥ dushaṭ dōkhiyan kō chhai karatā ॥402॥
translation: The Lord is the destroyer of all the sins of the body and all the malicious and wicked persons.402.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 402 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

transliteration: Srī asidhuj jab bhaē dayālā ॥ pūran karā granth tatkālā ॥
translation: When Mahakal became kind, He immediately caused me to complete this book;

gurmukhi: mn bWCq Pl pwvY soeI ] dUK n iqsY ibAwpq koeI ]403]
transliteration: Man bāñchhat phal pāvai sōī ॥ dūkh na tisai biāpat kōī ॥403॥
translation: He will obtain the fruit desired by the mind (who will read or listen to this book) and no suffering will occur to him.403.
attributes: cOpeI - cirqR 404 - 403 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: AiV`l ]

translation: O God ! the day when I caught hold of your feet, I do not bring anyone else under my sight; none other is liked by me now; the Puranas and the Quran try to know Thee by the names of Ram and Rahim and talk about you through several stories, but I do not ac
attributes: 24 Avqwr rwm - 863 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: isMimRiq swsqR byd sBY bhu Byd khY hm eyk n jwnXo ] sRI Aispwn ikRpw qumrI kir mY n khXo sB qoih bKwnXo ]863]
transliteration: Simmriti sāsatr bēd sabhai bahu bhēd kahai ham ēk na jānyō ॥ srī asipān kripā tumrī kari mai na kahyō sabh tōhi bakhānyō ॥863॥
translation: The Simritis, Shastras and Vedas describe several mysteries of yours, but I do not agree with any of them. O sword-wielder God! This all has been described by Thy Grace, what power can I have to write all this?.863.
attributes: 24 Avqwr rwm - 863 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb

gurmukhi: dohrw ]
transliteration: Dōharā ॥
translation: DOHRA

gurmukhi: sgl duAwr kau Cwif kY ghXo quhwro duAwr ] bWih ghy kI lwj Ais goibMd dws quhwr ]864]
transliteration: Sagal duār kau chhāḍi kai gahyō tuhārō duār ॥ bāńhi gahē kī lāj asi gōbind dās tuhār ॥864॥
translation: O Lord ! I have forsaken all other doors and have caught hold of only Thy door. O Lord ! Thou has caught hold of my arm; I, Govind, am Thy serf, kindly take (care of me and) protect my honour.864.
attributes: 24 Avqwr rwm - 864 - sRI dsm gRMQ swihb
